title: Streaming service subscribers in India 2017
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Video-on-demand Service, and Number of subscribers in millions in each Video-on-demand Service on the y axis.
The Number of subscribers in millions is highest at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and lowest at Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
The difference of Number of subscribers in millions between the highest and lowest Video-on-demand Service is 60.6.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Video-on-demand Service, and Number of subscribers in millions in each Video-on-demand Service on the y axis.
Video-on-demand Service Hotstar has the highest Number of subscribers in millions and Ozee TV has the lowest Number of subscribers in millions.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Video-on-demand Service, and Number of subscribers in millions in each Video-on-demand Service on the y axis.
The Number of subscribers in millions is highest at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and lowest at Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
The difference of Number of subscribers in millions between the highest and lowest Video-on-demand Service is 60.6.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of subscribers in millions for 6 number of Video-on-demand Services.
The Number of subscribers in millions is highest at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and lowest at Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
The second highest Number of subscribers in millions is appeared to be the Video-on-demand Service Voot.
The lowest value at Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV is 26.25x times less than the highest value at Hotstar.
Number of subscribers in millions at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar is 63.0 , second place is Voot at 13.2, and thirdly is Amazon Video at 9.5.
The highest value 63.0 at Hotstar is almost 3.9 times larger than the average value 16.15.
Summing up the values of all Video-on-demand Services, we get total 96.9.
